Server.Name: GrowAPair - SurViVal
Server.Description:
Welcome to GrowAPair. A custom modded server featuring quality of life mods.
Current Mods include:
War3zuk A18 AIO Overhaul - 0-CreaturePackAnimals - 0-CreaturePackHumans - 0-CreaturePackZombies - BDubs Nuka Colas - Bdubs Vehicles - Boulder Regen - Hitmarkers - Khelldon Screamer Bears - Moong Military Tablet - More Vanilla Food - SMXhud - SMXmenu - Syth Water Buff - Telrics Health Bars 2.0 - Valmars Buffed Supply Crate Drops - Valmars Disable Falling Trees - Vehicle Respawner - War3zuk Alpha 18 AIO - War3zuk Extra Deco Ore - War3zuk Paintings XXX 2x3 - War3zuk Suicide girls XXX - Xyth SteelBars

Have fun and enjoy your stay.
